name: Mauscape Julia
description:
Take the control of a mouse toy, explore the room see with different eyes, how big things can be  and scape of Julia the naughty cat, she loves play with his toys around the room. A videogame inspired of my cat. 

In Mauscape Julia you are a mouse toy, the favorite of Julia, you have to find the cheeses around the room and scape of Julia before times out. Good luck!.

W,S,A,D: to move

Mouse: to look around

Esc: Paused

1. Download .zip file.

2. Extract the files.

3. Click on the icon Mauscape Julia to play.
